item.title: Mon premier article
item.description: Ceci est mon premier article [//]: <> () def main(): # We only want arp requests berkeley_packet_filter = "(arp[6:2] = 1)" # sniffing for one packet that will be sent to a function, while storing none #sniff(filter=berkeley_packet_filter, prn=show_arp_packets, store=0, count=1) sniff(filter=berkeley_packet_filter, prn=handle_arp_packets, store=0, count=1) if __name__ == "__main__": #print(ipaddr,macaddr) main()
item.content:
Ceci est mon premier article

[//]: <> ()

def main():
    # We only want arp requests
    berkeley_packet_filter = "(arp[6:2] = 1)"
    # sniffing for one packet that will be sent to a function, while storing none
    #sniff(filter=berkeley_packet_filter, prn=show_arp_packets, store=0, count=1)
    sniff(filter=berkeley_packet_filter, prn=handle_arp_packets, store=0, count=1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    #print(ipaddr,macaddr)
    main()
